BigCommerce has big news about omni-channel selling. Read the latest news to find out more Quarterly 2016 Updates Sell more, everywhere BigCommerce has been making big moves to enable success in today’s omni-channel retailing environment. In the last month, we’ve transformed our platform into a hub for selling on social channels like Facebook and Pinterest, in physical stores with Square and soon through marketplaces like eBay. When, where, why and how Americans buy online Find out how, when, where and why Americans make online purchases today –– and use the data to inform your most successful omni-channel strategy yet.
